law.catch_line: A consignee is entitled to a lien on goods shipped or consigned to him for any money or negotiable i...
law.text: A consignee is entitled to a lien on goods shipped or consigned to him for any money or negotiable instrument advanced or given to or for the use of the person in whose name the goods were shipped or consigned, unless the consignee has notice that the person is not the true owner of the goods.
